### Advanced R for Bioinformatics
:::{style="margin-bottom:1em;"}
##### 11-22 June 2023, Visby, Gotland, Sweden.
:::

This workshop aims to take the participants beyond the basics of R to a deeper and comprehensive understanding of the R ecosystem.
